items.text: While the woman stirred <disambig> the big pot |warmed| up on the stove.
The boy <disambig> offered the shirt |looked| unhappy.
When the girl painted<disambig> her arm |was| colored by the boy.
While the child cleaned <disambig> the mom |sat| on the couch.
When the woman ordered<disambig> her boyfriend |was| still deciding on what to eat.
The son <disambig> gifted the new shoes |let| his dad help put them on.
The boy <disambig> just sold ice cream |felt| happy about the size of the scoops.
As the girls excitedly studied<disambig> the boy |wrote| in his notebook.
